$! You can get advice on an asylum or immigration problem through the Office of the Immigration Services Commissioner. $!

You will be able to get details of advisers in your area, or help finding a legal representative.

$C
**Office of the Immigration Services Commissioner**  
0845 000 0046  
<info@oisc.gov.uk>  
[Find a regulated immigration adviser](http://oisc.homeoffice.gov.uk/how_to_find_a_regulated_immigration_adviser/ "Office of the Immigration Services Commissioner"){:rel="external"}  
$C

You can also find a solicitor or advice service using the [legal adviser finder.](http://legaladviserfinder.justice.gov.uk/ "legal adviser finder"){:rel="external"}

You may be able to get [legal aid](/legal-aid/ "legal aid") to pay for legal advice.

*[OISC]: Office of the Immigration Services Commissioner
overview: Where to get help and advice for immigration or asylum problems, and how to find a legal representative in your area.
title: Legal advice for immigration and asylum problems
